name: BodymappScanner-ios
summary: BodymappScanner-ios is a scanning sdk that uses depth sensor to scan your body.
description: BodymappScanner-ios uses the depth sensor in your mobile device* to map the external contours of your body and transform it into a 3D bodymesh that matches your true body shape. This means you donâ€™t need to purchase another device or leave the house to do a body scan!
